titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lena Kelly Collection on the Bronx Gaelic League AIA.087
titlestmt.author: Rachel Searcy

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-03 11:50:31 -0400.

change.item: Revised by Marissa Grossman to reflect the rehousing of materials.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Lena Kelly Collection on the Bronx Gaelic League

physdesc.extent: in 1 half manuscript box and a shared oversize flat box

did.abstract: Lena Kelly (née McGann) is a member and former treasurer of the Bronx Gaelic League. The Lena Kelly Collection on the Bronx Gaelic League consists of materials collected by Kelly documenting her involvement with the Bronx Gaelic League from approximately 1960-1990. Materials include event programs, correspondence, newsletters, photographs, and ephemera for events like feiseanna and anniversary dinners.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
did.langmaterial: Most materials are in English, with some materials in both English and Irish.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Lena Kelly Collection on the Bronx Gaelic League consists of materials collected by Kelly documenting her involvement with the Bronx Gaelic League from approximately 1960-1990. Materials include event programs, correspondence, newsletters, photographs, and ephemera for events like feiseanna and anniversary dinners.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Lena Kelly were transferred to New York University in 2019 by the donor. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Lena Kelly in August 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.117.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Lena Kelly Collection on the Bronx Gaelic League; AIA 087; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in archival boxes and folders, and described on the collection-level.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Lena Kelly (née McGann) is a member and former treasurer of the Bronx Gaelic League.
